p: The addition of thyme oil to the dispersions of AgNPs stabilized with chitosan (the low molecular weight type) produces a decrease in the MIC values of AgNPs recorded for C. albicans and S. aureus strains, but the effects are indifferent for all the ratios ranging from 5:1 to 40:1. Synergistic effects were observed in the cases of E. coli and P. aeruginosa, but at mixtures less concentrated in essential oil compared to the formulation with bare AgNPs.
